name: Humiseal UV Curable Adhesives Family
description: Humiseal UV Curable Adhesives Family are single component, acrylated urethane-based polymers that crosslink to tough and resilient adhesives with exposure to UV light. UV curable adhesives are excellent for high speed or high volume applications where fast or immediate curing is required. In addition, their single-component curing mechanism results in consistent and reliable performance without concerns about mix ratios or generation of heat.
